content:
There are several reasons why organizations might choose to implement a global full text search:

1. Improved information access: By allowing users to quickly and easily search for specific information within a large collection of documents, global full text search can improve the efficiency and effectiveness of information access.
2. Increased productivity: By making it easier for employees to find the information they need, global full text search can help to increase productivity and reduce the time and effort required to complete tasks.
3. Better customer service: By making it easier for customers to find the information they need on a company's website, global full text search can help to improve customer service and satisfaction.
4. Competitive advantage: Having a powerful search functionality can be a competitive advantage for companies that need to access large amounts of data quickly and easily
5. Better data analysis: Having a global full text search can help to discover insights from unstructured text data, this can be a powerful tool for companies to make better decisions.
